title: Research and Resources
copy: Get an introduction to our online search tools .   Discover multiple avenues for research including digital image archives , oral histories , online databases , research guides , and more. The Ryerson and Burnham Libraries reading room, as well as the museum’s Photography and Prints and Drawings study rooms, are currently closed. Find further details on virtual reference services . Some external research based on Art Institute collections can be found at the University of Chicago Center of Art of East Asia website . Additional subscription-based resources can be found in the Museum Studies Archive on Jstor and the Yale University Press Art and Architecture eportal .
